name: Rise of the Tomb Raider - Blood Ties
name_original: Rise of the Tomb Raider - Blood Ties
description:
Rise of the Tomb Raider - Blood Ties is an action game. It came out on 26-04-2016. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
Rise of the Tomb Raider - Blood Ties is available on macOS, Linux, Xbox 360 and Xbox One.
